examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I took the trial for the subscription. I attempted to cancel my subscription about a week ago, now I have been charged. Could I please get my money back and my subscription officially cancelled?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Refund my money. I canceled 2 weeks ago my free trial but you charge me. I want you to refund me.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my 30 day trial about a week or two ago I can't remember but I have not used it    . I am requesting a refund because I do not use this account and will not use this account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have cancelled my subscription and was still charged.. I am jobless and have rent to pay this week. Please refund my money. I did not use the services

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i did not use it i have use your web for free taril and i stoped that more than 2 weeks ago kindly return my money now now now now now

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there, 

I thought I cancelled my subscription two weeks ago. Turns out it didn’t go through and I got charged 155$ for this new month when I no longer currently use Canva. I would like to request a refund, please and thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had cancelled my subscription a few weeks ago. I was told that I'll be receiving my refund within 12 days. I still haven't received it. Kindly process the refund asap.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi ....
I'd like to request refund because I can't afford and do not really use pro version from Canva.  I had cancelled the plan a week ago but maybe it was not done completely well therefore I am charged with the payment today. I hope I can get the refund. thank you very much

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am so sorry! I had tried to cancel my subscription last week but was having trouble doing so on my phone and then it charged me yesterday and I just saw the email. Can you please provide refund?

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have used the software for a week during the free trial period and have not used since. I didn’t receive any further notification regarding subscription in the past week but amount was deducted today without my knowledge for a yearly subscription. Hence I kindly request you to please refund the money and also cancel my subscription. Thank you.

Refund request reason: last week I cancelled the subscription but I still got charged today. I am extremely confused about this as I also never received an email saying it would charge me. 

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I canceled my Canva subscription a few weeks ago, and I'm not sure what went wrong but I was just charged again. I hit "cancel subscription" and went through the process, but I guess something happened and it didnt work. but I havent used Canva for at least 2 months and just have no need for it right now so if I could be refunded I would appreciate it! thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi I cancelled this subscription at the beginning of this week as i did not want to pay. Can i please be refunded the amount I have paid, and my subscription recancelled?

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I actually cancelled my subscription last week. Could you tell me why I’m being charged? I would like to receive a refund. Thanks!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled this subscription a week after I originally set it up because I don’t use it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My free trial was not finished so therefore I was not given the time to cancel my subscription. I now have no money for a week because of this. I have two children to feed.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I requested over a week ago that I wanted to cancel and refund my subscription and I have not received any response.  Please have some get back to me .  Thank you.    Alex Caicedo  <EMAIL>  562.916.6532.  Thank you!

Refund request reason: I am requesting a refund of the Canva Pro annual plan as I canceled my subscription already 2 weeks ago but apparently it did not go through. Convinced of the positive outcome (of the cancellation made 2 weeks ago) I would never have thought they would have deducted the money from my card. I trust in your professionalism and that you can understand my situation! Invoice number: <NUMBER>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I have canceled the subscripton a week ago. Please refund the money and cancel effectively the subscription. I was charged by some mistake.
 I am looking forward to hearing from you.  Thank you. Regards,

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled about 2 weeks ago and I have been charged for a subscription. I would like a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled this service a week ago, and I went in today and cancelled again. I would like a refund as I made sure to cancel and somehow the cancellation did not go through.

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I have been charged for a subscription that I previously canceled. I demand a refund of what has been debited from my card without authorization since I decided not to continue working with Canva more than 2 weeks ago. Attached invoice detail: <NUMBER>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi,

Last week, I cancelled my free trial of Canva, since I couldn't access the PRO-functions. Now, money has been drawn from my account even though the subscription was canceled. 
Is there anything you can do to help me get my money back?
Kind regards

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I cancelled this subscription weeks ago and just noticed the payment  posted to my Visa card today January 20, 2021.  Could this please cancel the subscription and refund the $155.88.  Thank you.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello,

I would like to please request a refund from Canva as I was only wanting to try the trial. I just lost my job this week and am finically unable to support myself. This invoice is my weekly rental which I am extremely stressed about. 

I’m so sorry, but could I please cancel my subscription and receive a refund it would help me in more ways you would know.

Thanks so much. 

<NAME>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my subscription weeks ago, and I have been charged two months in a row ever since

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my free trial a while back, I have no idea why I am being charged with this. At the time I cancelled, I never received a confirmation email so I thought it was odd, but my screen said I had cancelled it. This money is all I had to feed my children this week.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Did not authorized. Tried to cancel weeks ago. Please refund. I don't use this service. Thank you

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The account has not been used for more than three weeks and for personal reasons I could not cancel the subscription in time, today I have internet access and I am attentively requesting a refund for favor

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I sent a request to cancel our subscription and to receive a refund a couple of weeks ago as requested by my boss.  I have not received that refund information.  We are a Government agency and cannot pay for services we are unable to use.  Please refund .  Thank you!

Refund request reason: For the recent transaction I was sure that I unsubscribed a few weeks ago. I have not used Canva at all for months 

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my trial several weeks ago. I should not have been charged. 

Please correct. 

Thanks,
<NAME>

Refund request reason: Nehama Shira Zarviv Request a subscription refund - I wanted to try the subscription for a month, try to see if I have any use for it. But I saw that I only used it for two weeks due to lack of interest and time. I ask to receive the missing because today is the first day of payment and I have not used it at all and I have no use for it at all. Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot to cancel my subscription this past week and I just recently saw that I received a charge on this. I was hoping to see if I could a refund since I was only going to use it once for a school project. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled the Pro Subscription 2 weeks ago. I got confirmation but still was charged. I have not been using pro features.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancel the subscription a few weeks ago and i never found how and I tried to communicate with you and I never had a response. The subscription is to expensive and I now have my money account in negative because I didn’t have the money to pay for it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had a free trial that I thought I cancelled but I was automatically billed this week. I haven't used Canva in several weeks and did not intend to pay the $120 pro membership fee. I'd like to receive a refund and cancel my subscription. My initial request to cancel did not go through, possibly due to Wi-Fi issues I've been experiencing.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My subscription is due to renew today. 

I can see the transaction amount 'pending' in my checking account. 

I lost my job seven months ago due to covid and have not managed to find new employment. 
Paying this subscription would adversely affect my financial position. 
Would you please cancel my subscription as of this week and cancel the payment 'pending' on my account, so that I do not pay for the 2021 subscription? This is literally what I will use to buy groceries this week. 
Sincerely,
Jay

Describe the problem: A few weeks ago I informed about the problem - I canceled my paid account before the deadline, my card was charged for the full year of using the service. Until today, I have not received any email with an explanation or a refund. The subscription is inactive. Please explain and refund to my account. I cannot use the "Request a fund" option in the chat because there is no invoice for me in the system. My transaction title: <NUMBER>What kind of problem are you reporting ?: Other

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: We have been trying to cancel for weeks and want to do so immediately.
So no more payments.
You are therefore no longer allowed to withdraw money from our bank account

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled the trial version few weeks ago, I was shock that the renewal push through even I cancelled it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought that I cancelled my subscription.  I do not need Canva- I was only trying it for about a week.  Thanks. Amanda Riegel

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I canceled my subscription a few weeks ago, I was not aware it did not successfully cancel until I was charged. I have now made sure it was canceled this time, and I would also like the amount refunded.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello I am reaching out because I cancelled my Canva subscription last week and I was charged for an annual subscription today. I would appreciate your support. Thank you in advance.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 

I have unsubscribed Canva few weeks ago. However it shocked me that I was charged $119 yesterday. I don’t know what is going on. I can’t afford such transaction right now. I need refund. Please assist.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello!
I has cancelled my subscription 2 weeks ago, but I’m guess it wasn’t successful. Canva pro is no longer compatible for me, so I cancelled it, but was still charged. I would like to be reimbursed for this month as I will not use it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Unauthorized charge on my account. I do not use Canva and my email was hacked two weeks ago.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there, I did not use and will not be using Canva.  The reminder that I had an account went to my Spam folder.  I would like a refund for the charge from Jan 14, 2021.  My account has not been used in weeks.
Thank you,
Leigh
<NUMBER>

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, I did the testing period and I couldn't cancel in time to be charged. It was charged to my credit card a week ago. I would like to cancel the subscription and get a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Subscription should have been canceled last week. I do not use canva it was my daughter and my bank account is now at a negative balance for something I was not using.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled this account a few weeks ago. I have no use for canva. Refund my account please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancel this weeks and and it was not in my subscription list. I don't use this app and I don't want it

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I requested to have my account canceled last week but then was charged for another month on the 18th. Wondering what the issue is and how to be refunded?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I don’t use this app and I have been trying to cancel it for two weeks. I just want a refund

Refund request reason: I placed a request to cancel this subscription 2 weeks ago when I was laid off of my job. This charge is messing up my other bills and I desperately need a refund. I do not undersatnd why my service was never cancelled in the first place. As you can easily see I stopped using it. I greatly appreciate your assistance in this matter.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello. I requested for my billing to be cancelled around 3 weeks ago. But today i noticed that i was charged. I would like to request a for that payment to be refunded. Thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancel my subscription a few weeks ago, but somehow the subscription did not show up. Thus I was unable to end it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was not satisfied with my order and I still have not received my money and I have been emailing yall for 2 weeks

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I signed up for a canva pro trial about a month ago and assumed I would be aware when it was time for me to cancel my subscription since I have no intention of paying the money for it. I was using the program about once a week, to help a not-for-profit organization with a few posters, (if you visit my account, you can see as such). When I received the email telling me that my subscription was about to end and I would be getting charged, I was in the middle of finals week (I am in grade 11), and was extremely busy, not checking my email. I do not have the funds to pay for such a thing and I am so upset that I missed the email. Can you do anything for me?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had thought I had canceled this over two weeks ago, but I guess something went wrong. I don't use this and need a refund as that money was part of my rent.
Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have emailed about a few weeks ago about my card being charged after my subscriptions have been canceled & I need this resolved. Thanks,
Gentry

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have been cancelling my subscription all week and it wasn’t working. so i got charged today when i’ve been trying to cancel.

¿Cómo podemos ayudarte?: Like why should I request the cancellation. I want to be able to cancel it whenever I want. I've tried to cancel it for weeks and I couldn't. Also wrote to them. I want my money back and CANCEL THE ACCOUNT.

Refund request reason: Somehow, I got charged for something I don't use. I logged in once, several weeks ago to check out my options and suddenly I have this automatic charge on my account for a full year, which I not only never used but don't intend to ever use. I would appreciate your integrity in issuing a refund. If you check my account, you'll see that I have no need for this  version of Canva and have been charged in error. Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had no idea this was going to be charged to my account your I would have canceled before it went through!!!!! I would have never chosen a year subscription. And I never got an email saying it was going to happen. As a matter of fact I haven’t even logged in to the site in quite a few weeks. I have canceled my subscription, this is something I am not interested in right now. Maybe later.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My card was charged when it shouldn't have been my subscription to pro been off for weeks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I sent a request to cancel this service over 2 weeks ago when I was laid off of my job due to COVID 19 closures. I do not understand why I was still charged anyway. I desperately need a refund of these charges.  I would greatly appreciate your assiatnace in this matter. As I am sure you can see after I cancelled the service I also stopped using it so you should know that I am telling the truth regarding this matter. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was trying pro features but I don't use it much. I cancelled one week ago

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I canceled my subscription days before the test deadline, however, due to an error, the account remained active. I was only able to proceed with the cancellation after being charged the monthly amount, even though I haven't used it in weeks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was not satisfied with my order and I would like to get e refund. I have been Emailing the company for a week and I am very disappointed that I still have not received feedback!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: hi im so sorry to bother, but I tried to cancel this a few weeks ago and I guess I must not have done it right because I still saw a charge on my bank statement is there any way I can get a refund for this? thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I inadvertently selected an annual subscription when only wanted try Canva out for another month. I cancelled the subscription shortly thereafter a few weeks ago.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled this trial from my account several weeks ago and I have not used any of the features! Please do not take the payment, I cannot afford it and I'm out of work with my rent due. Please do not take the payment.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there- I cancelled my account a few weeks ago. Can you please help?

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello! I canceled my subscription to canva pro this week, I think it was January 5 and I am being charged for a service that I canceled and I don't want to renew

Refund request reason: Items printed uneven , refund request a few weeks ago.

I would like a refund as its the fact that some time that the subscription is active thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: This was suppose to be canceled weeks ago and today i got charged, I DO NOT WANT THIS SUBSCRIPTION
